description: The code for jsonutils has moved from oslo-incubated to the oslo.serialization library. References to the old jsonutils in nova.openstack.common should be updated to use the version in oslo.serialization.
title: Update imports to use jsonutils from oslo.serialization

comments.content: The code for jsonutils has moved from oslo-incubated to the oslo.serialization library. References to the old jsonutils in nova.openstack.common should be updated to use the version in oslo.serialization.
